name: Collaborative Shmup
description:
Collaborative Shmup is not a shoot'em up, because you can't shoot. But it's inspired.

It is a local-multiplayer game where multiple players can control the white ship at the center of the screen. Their goal is to prevent other ships to reach their respective planet. As said, the goal of other players is to go to its planet to get points.

How to play : Every player must connect its device to the same local network as the host (the device wich launches the game). Once you're connected, you can go to http://happyfuntimes.net and enter your name. To control the white ship, your name must be "v". Any other name will control other ships that pops on the center of the screen.

Made with Unity by Maxime Wyzuj, using the HappyFunTimes asset.
